line.text: Like as the waves make towards the pebbled shore
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So do our minutes hasten to their end
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Each changing place with that which goes before
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In sequent toil all forwards do contend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nativity once in the main of light
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Crawls to maturity wherewith being crowned
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Crooked eclipses gainst his glory fight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And Time that gave doth now his gift confound
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Time doth transfix the flourish set on youth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And delves the parallels in beauty brow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Feeds on the rarities of nature truth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And nothing stands but for his scythe to mow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And yet to times in hope my verse shall stand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Praising thy worth despite his cruel hand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
